name: Escape to the Afterlife
description:
The reign of King Necherophes is over... The Pharaoh who reigned over the people of Egypt for many years has passed away and has been respectfully buried in a tomb fit for a king. A tomb akin to a labyrinth with twists and turns, keys and locks, doors and switches... Every measure has been taken to protect the king and his precious treasures...

However, the Pharaoh's work is not yet done!

He still has to pass on to the afterlife!

Follow the late pharaoh, King Necherophes as he journeys to escape the realm of the living and enter the land of the dead. Collect treasures and combat the lost souls of the Rayth in this adventure with the graphics of an arcade classic and the audio of a modern adventure!

~Controls~

WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement

Space - Jump

E - Attack

W - Enter the portal

Escape - Pause

Space/Enter - Confirm

Game, music and graphics made by Harry Simpson: https://twitter.com/SimpsonGame

Game made for Mini Jam 61
Limitation: Game must be themed around two conflicting ideas
Explanation: The conflicting themes are the graphical style compared to the instrumentation of the music
